document.full_text: the killing of osama bin laden is a foreign policy triumph for the united states, and it creates new possibilities in afghanistan. but this isn't the end of al qaeda or of terrorism.
document.title: nicholas d. kristof: after osama bin laden...
lines_and_colors: the killing of osama bin laden is a foreign policy triumph for the united states, and it creates new possibilities in afghanistan. but this isn't the end of al qaeda or of terrorism.
